name: VMware NSX-T Sample to create a logical switch

metadata.displayName: VMware NSX-T Sample to create a logical switch
metadata.longDescription: This template creates a sample logical switch on an existing VMware NSX-T platform.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user must have a transport zone created on VMware NSX-T before using this template.
  2. The user is responsible for obtaining the appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
